description:
In the last 5 years I was trying to loose my weight again and again. After enormous number of experiments, fortunatelly, I have finally discovered the way.

In this course I would like to guide you on your journey to build your dream body. I would be honoured to be the one who gets you from here and now to make your dream come true. But I will need your help!

In the following course I will provide you with all the necessary information gained from my own experiments. We will develop sustainable diet just for you by challenging common assumptions and creating new, subjective aproach worth the individual. Together, we will lose weight, increase your performance and tune up your body to live healthy, desease free life. And if you have lost all your weight, this course is for you as well! Staying at your target weight is the toughest part. This course will enable you to stay fit forever!

Let´s get started!
title: Sustaining FAT-Loss & living a healthy life
